summary: When he wins the lottery, an ordinary guy quits his job to pursue his dream of becoming a pro soccer player by devoting 10,000 hours to training.
cast: Peter Magnusson|Karin Lithman|Özz Nûjen|Mathilda von Essen|Jessica Aleryd|Jonny Blomkvist|Christian Brandin|David Carlsson|Signe Dahlkvist|Nils Dernevik|Sten Erici|Siw Erixon|Erik Fornander|Patrik Fridh|Fredrik Gunnarsson|Viktor Haggren|Kaj Hagstedt|Robert Holik|Jens Jansson|Jacob Johannesson|Anders Johansson|Ida Karolin Johansson|Sara Chaanhing Kennedy|Jennica Landén|Torbjörn Lindberg|Jens Lindgård|Emma Hansson Löfgren|Jan Michelsen|Jörgen Nilsson|Ola Norén|André Olander Goding|Martin Olson|Henrik Pantzar|Kardo Razzazi|Jeanette Rudbring|Mauritia Schapira|Magnus Schmitz|Noah Zarrinnam|Mikael Roth|Andras Sunyi
title: 10 000 timmar
